name: cloudent-reputation-circuit
description: AI Agent Reputation Zero-Knowledge Proof Circuit

scripts.prove:input: npm run build && node dist/prover.js input.json
scripts.prove:input1: npm run build && node dist/prover.js input1.json
scripts.verify:zkverify: npm run build && node dist/verifier.js zkverify
scripts.verify:input1: npm run build && node dist/verifier.js files ./proof1.json ./public1.json
scripts.verify:zkverify:input1: npm run build && node dist/verifier.js zkverify ./proof1.json ./public1.json
scripts.clean: rm -rf build dist ptau *.wtns *.json proof.json public.json calldata.txt
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run prove

author: Cloudent Team
